source:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Master Mogzin is looking frantically around the Mogmender camp.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
バール・レス広場の団長のモグジンは、タレソンの話を一緒に聞いてほしいようだ。

source:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SEQ_01<tab>At long last, the Mogmenders are ready to begin building the statue demanded by Gullinbursti. Tarresson and Mogzin have been waiting for you to discuss how to begin construction.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストには「<var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var><var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> レベルアジャスト」が、
　設定されています。

前回までの冒険録：
タレソンから、神殿騎士団からの資材が届かないと聞いた冒険者とモグジン。資材回収をモグジンに任せた冒険者は、モグジンたちの技術の伸び悩みを解決するため、新たな道具作りに挑戦する。出来上がった試作品を資材回収から帰ってきたモグジンに試してもらったところ、以前よりも使いやすくなっているという。さっそく試作品を元に、モグモグ修復団の道具が更新され、伸び悩みは解決したのだった。
　　　　　　　　　　　　*　*　*
モグジンからタレソンの話を一緒に聞くよう頼まれた。バール・レス広場の「タレソン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SEQ_02<tab>Although Mogzin would like to begin work immediately, you realize that although you know what the statue stood for, you do not know what it looked like. After mulling over the question for a moment, you come to the conclusion that it likely depicted a scene of man and dragon living in harmony. However, with all such statues having been destroyed years ago, there is nothing to base yours on. Tarresson suggests that maybe the Temple Knights possess something that could be of use, and instructs you to go to the Congregation to ask Ser Handeloup if he can part with a heretical idol. In case the knight is hesitant to fulfill your request, Tarresson gives you a letter which he assures you will convince Ser Handeloup to do so.
target: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SEQ_02<tab>タレソンと話し、「友情の証」たる石像の修復にとりかかることを聞いた。その見本とするため、異端者から押収した彫像を神殿騎士団から受け取ってくるよう頼まれる。イシュガルドの神殿騎士団本部の「アンドゥルー」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C3B01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SEQ_03<tab>As Tarresson suspected, Handeloup initially refuses your request, but changes his mind after reading the contents of the letter. In it, Tarresson has written that any figures taken from the Churning Mists should be returned to the moogles, as they have been tasked with taking care of the ancient ruins which dot the region. You ask how Tarresson knows so much about Ishgardian politics, prompting Handeloup to reveal that the humble stonemason was once in fact the count of House Dzemael. The commander agrees that Tarresson's reasoning is sound, and grants you leave to request an idol from his subordinate Vaincannet.
target: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SEQ_03<tab>彫像の貸し出しを渋るアンドゥルーに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C3B01 /var>を渡した。書簡に記されていた方法を使えば、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C3C01 /var>を渡せると彼は言う。さらにアンドゥルーは、タレソンが前ゼーメル伯爵であると教えてくれた。<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C3C01 /var>を受け取るため、神殿騎士団本部の「ヴァンカネー」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SEQ_04<tab>The attendant rummages through a collection of similar-looking statuettes and hands you one. Although it seems there are many others like it, you hold in your hand the image which will be immortalized at Bahrr Lehs.
target: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SEQ_04<tab>ヴァンカネーと話し、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C3C01 /var>を受けとった。バール・レス広場の「タレソン」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C3C01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SEQ_05<tab>Tarresson exclaims that the idol is the perfect model to base the statue on, and observes that you have returned without the letter he sent you with. It is then that he formally introduces himself as the former Count de Dzemael, and he confides that the work with the Mogmenders has been an ideal way for him to spend his time since stepping down from the position of count. He returns to the matter of the statue, and tasks you with crafting yet another set of supplies. Mogmul awaits with any materials you require.
target: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SEQ_05<tab>タレソンに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C3C01 /var>を渡した。彼は前ゼーメル伯爵である自分が、なぜモーグリ族の修復計画に参加したのか、その心情を吐露した。頼まれた部材に使う素材を受け取るため、バール・レス広場の「大食いのモグムリ」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SEQ_06<tab>Mogmul seems eager to have the statue completed, if only for the fact that it means he will at last be able to eat something. However, he promises to stay vigilant until your work is done.

※In the event you lose the ingredients or the synthesis ends in failure, you may try again by speaking with Mogmul Mogbelly.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SEQ_06<tab>モグムリから素材を受けとった。「<var 28 ((Item)) F23D8501 /var>」をもとに「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F23D6B01 /var>」を製作し、バール・レス広場の「団長のモグジン」に納品しよう。

※「<var 28 ((Item)) F23D8501 /var>」を失った場合は、大食いのモグムリに話しかけましょう。材料を入手し、再挑戦が可能になります。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SEQ_07<tab>Mogzin applies the final touches to the statue, and everyone stands back to look in pride upon their accomplishment. Just then, Gullinbursti descends from the skies to pass judgment on the work of man and moogle. However, while he does not deride your efforts, it is a far cry from the accolades that Mogzin had hoped to receive. The dragon promises not to interfere further, but as he flies away, you cannot help but think that your work is far from over.
target: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SEQ_07<tab>モグジンに<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F23D6B01 /var>を納品した。渡した部材を使い、モグジンたちが石像を修復し終えると、ちょうどよくグリンブルスティがやってきた。彼は石像を見ると、モグジンたちを認めてくれる。しかし、モグジンはどこか納得がいかない様子だ……。修復もいよいよ大詰め、引き続き協力と指導を行っていこう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Tarresson.
target: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TODO_00<tab>タレソンと話す

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the letter to Handeloup at the Congregation of Our Knights Most Heavenly.
target: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TODO_01<tab>神殿騎士団本部のアンドゥルーに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C3B01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Vaincannet.
target: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TODO_02<tab>ヴァンカネーと話す

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the statuette to Tarresson at Bahrr Lehs.
target: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TODO_03<tab>バール・レス広場のタレソンに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C3C01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Mogmul Mogbelly.
target: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TODO_04<tab>大食いのモグムリと話す

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TODO_05<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize statue supplies <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var>)) ((Show the statue supplies <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var> to Master Mogzin)) /var>.
target: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TODO_05<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((製作手帳 蛮族クエスト：<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F23D6B01 /var>を製作)) ((団長のモグジンに<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F23D6B01 /var>を納品)) /var>

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_000<tab>Where could <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> be... Where could <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> be? Oh, there you are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Tarresson's ready to discuss how to begin building the statue, but we dare not start without you, kupo! Now, let's see what he has to say!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_000<tab>センセイ、待っていたくぽ！
モグと一緒に、オヤカタの話を聞いてほしいくぽ！
きっと、あの石像の修復について、話をするつもりくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_001<tab>Gullinbursti will be moved to tears by our work! Can dragons cry, kupo? Ah, never mind all that. I suppose we shouldn't get ahead of ourselves. Let's first discuss where to begin!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_001<tab>ファッファッファッ、ついにこのときが来たくぽ！
グリンブルスティさんに、モグたちを認めさせるくぽ！
センセイ、一緒にオヤカタの話を聞くくぽーッ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_010<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, how good of you to join us! Once Ohl Deeh graces us with his presence we can begin our discussion. Ah, here he is now.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_010<tab>おお、冒険者殿。
すまぬが少々、待ってもらえるか？
まだ参加者が揃って……っと、来たようじゃな。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_OHLDEEH_000_011<tab>Greetings. For what purpose did you summon me here? Do you require my strength once more?
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_OHLDEEH_000_011<tab>おうおう、話ってなんでい、タレソン爺さんよぉ？
いよいよ俺っちの力が、必要になったってことかい？

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_012<tab>Indeed, Ohl Deeh, we would avail ourselves of your legendary strength. All of our work thus far has brought us to this decisive moment, and without your stout wings I fear we will have little hope of success!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_012<tab>うむ、そのとおりじゃ。
なにせ今回は、修復の山場。
お主の力がなければ、何も始まらんからのう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_OHLDEEH_000_013<tab>Then of course my wings are yours! I would never stand idly by as my friends struggle! No task is too large for me!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_OHLDEEH_000_013<tab>かーっ、しゃあねぇな！
俺っちがちょいと、鱗を脱いでやるぜぃ！
……で、今回は何をするんでぃ？

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_014<tab>I knew we could count on your support, kupo! Finally, we are ready to begin work on the Mogmenders' first official commission: the statue requested by Gullinbursti!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_014<tab>それはもちろん！
グリンブルスティさんから依頼された、石像の修復くぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_015<tab>A monument to friendship and peace, now lost to time. With their new tools, the Mogmenders are working with more vigor than I have ever seen. I believe they are more than ready to rise to this challenge!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_015<tab>その通り、「友情の証」と言われる石像じゃ。
皆、新たな道具に慣れ、腕前も磨きが掛かってきたからの。
いよいよ修復作業も大詰め……そろそろ頃合いじゃろうて。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_016<tab>We are ready, kupo! Ready to build a statue! A statue of...of what, exactly?
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_016<tab>くぽぽーッ！　やってやるくぽーッ！！
……ところで「友情の証」ってどんな形してるくぽ？

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_017<tab>It is the answer to that question which I have been contemplating, my dear Mogzin. Unfortunately, we have no pictures, no stories, and no remnants on which we can base the statue's form. We know only that it stood more than one thousand years ago, during the age when dragon and man lived together in harmony.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_017<tab>資料も遺構も残っておらんので、まったくわからん。
なにせ、この広場は千年前の、
人と竜が蜜月だった時代の遺跡じゃからのう……。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_018<tab>Could it be a kupa tree? Or an enormous cloud mallow? Hmmm...
target: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_018<tab>千年前……ヒトと竜……？

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_OHLDEEH_000_019<tab>Do not be daft, Mogzin! The statue likely depicted dragon and man. Brother once told me many such sculptures used to dot the land.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_OHLDEEH_000_019<tab>さっそく、俺っちが役に立つな！
そいつはおそらく「ヒトとドラゴン」の像でぃ！
昔は数多くあったと、古き翼のダンナ方から聞いたぜぃ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_020<tab>Ohl Deeh, I must say I had much the same thought. What better subjects could there have been to immortalize a bond which, at the time, must have seemed unbreakable?
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_020<tab>人と竜の蜜月時代から、存在していた意匠となれば、
なるほど、「友情の証」として相応しかろう！

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_021<tab>Even so, there's still so much we don't know! How were they posed? How many were there? No statues remain to draw inspiration from! Tarresson, do any survive down below?
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_021<tab>「ヒトとドラゴン」の像が「友情の証」なのはわかったくぽ。
でも、実物がない以上、新しく造り直すしかないくぽ……。
どこかに参考にできるものはないくぽ？

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_030<tab>Well, there is the relief at Falcon's Nest, but that work is much too recent to be of use. However, there may be another way.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_030<tab>……ファルコンネストに据えられたレリーフなら、
参考になるだろうが、あれを雲海まで持ってくるわけにもいかん。
ほかに参考になりそうなものは……。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_040<tab>Perhaps, but I fear they might prove difficult to procure. Unfortunately, there are still those who think simply glimpsing such an image would be grounds to accuse one of heresy. However, there may be another way.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_040<tab>ワシも「ヒトとドラゴン」の像など持ってはおらん。
皇都では、異端の証と受け取られるような代物じゃて。
ほかに参考になりそうなものは……。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_050<tab>Our mutual friends, the Temple Knights, have spent generations chasing heretics. Doubtless they have seized at least a few of their idols during their ceaseless struggle.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_050<tab>そうじゃ！　神殿騎士団なら、
異端者から押収した彫像を保管しておるかもしれん！

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_051<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, there is much work for us to do here at Bahrr Lehs. I would ask you to journey to Ishgard and ask our dear Handeloup if he can part with an idol. I have confidence he will oblige your request.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_051<tab>冒険者殿、すまんが皇都に戻り、
「アンドゥルー」卿に掛けあって、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C3C01 /var>」を借りてきてくれんか？

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_052<tab>However, if perchance he is hesitant to do so, hand him this letter. I believe it shall prove to be adequately convincing.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_052<tab>もし、アンドゥルー卿が渋るようであれば、
この書簡を彼に渡してくれ。
きっと快く、貸し出してくれるじゃろう……。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_053<tab>And what of us? While <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> is away, what should we do? Continue our stonemasonry practice?
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_053<tab>オヤカタ、お手本の調達はセンセイにお願いするとして、
モグたちは何をすればいいくぽ？
修復の練習くぽ？

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_054<tab>No, my dear Mogzin, there are preparations to be made. Speak with Mogmul, and ready the stone we will use for the statue. Ohl Deeh, pray help Mogzin with his duties.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_054<tab>お主は、モグムリと相談して、石材を用意するのじゃ！
オル・ディーは、モグジンを手伝っておくれ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_055<tab>For my part, I shall begin drawing up plans for the statue's base. Well then, I look forward to meeting again. May we all return with good news!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_055<tab>ワシは、その間に石像を据える台座の準備を進めておく。
それでは一同、行動開始じゃ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_056<tab>Make haste to the Congregation, and ask if Handeloup can spare an idol. If he insists on being difficult, simply hand him the letter I gave you. Trust me, it shall suffice.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_056<tab>皇都に戻って「アンドゥルー」卿から、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C3C01 /var>」を、借りてきてくれんか？
もし貸し出しを渋るなら、ワシの書簡を渡しておくれ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_HANDELOUP_000_060<tab>You require an idol seized from the heretics? Ah... My apologies, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but such a request is not within my power to grant.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_HANDELOUP_000_060<tab>……修復の見本として、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C3C01 /var>」を使いたいと？
押収品を私の一存で貸し出すのは難しいな……。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_HANDELOUP_000_070<tab>Pray understand that much as I would like to offer you a helping hand, there are some matters where my reach is limited.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_HANDELOUP_000_070<tab>私としても、君への協力を惜しみたくない。
だが、規則を曲げることはできん。
なにかほかに手は……む、タレソン殿からの書簡だと？

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_HANDELOUP_000_071<tab>A letter from Lord Tarresson? ...He writes that the figures in question were taken unlawfully from the Churning Mists, and that the moogles, as caretakers of the ancient ruins therein, are obliged to petition their return.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_HANDELOUP_000_071<tab>ふむふむ……彫像は、もともとドラヴァニア雲海にあったもの。
これを雲海に棲まうモーグリ族に「返還」する形式を採る、と。
略奪品の返還請求となれば、教皇庁とて文句は言えまい。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_HANDELOUP_000_072<tab>A rather more bureaucratic approach than I anticipated, but I would expect no less from a lord of House Dzemael. As skilled with his words as he is with a hammer and chisel.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_HANDELOUP_000_072<tab>さすがは、ゼーメルの古狐……。
このような、手続き上の穴を見つけるとはな。
……わかった、さっそく用意させよう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_HANDELOUP_000_073<tab>He has not told you? That cunning old fox is none other than Tarresson de Dzemael─formerly <var 1A 02 /var>Count<var 1A 01 /var> Tarresson de Dzemael. Although he has long since stepped down, he still does not scruple to intercede in various affairs.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_HANDELOUP_000_073<tab>む……もしや、タレソン殿のことを知らなかったのか？
彼の名はタレソン・ド・ゼーメル……前ゼーメル伯爵その人だよ。
今や引退して、悠々自適の生活をしているようだがな。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_HANDELOUP_100_073<tab>In any event, his reasoning is sound, and I see no harm in following his plan. Speak with my man Vaincannet. He will provide you with what you need.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_HANDELOUP_100_073<tab>ともかく、部下から目当ての品を受け取るといい。
「ヴァンカネー」に言えば、押収した「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C3C01 /var>」を、
受け取ることができるだろう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_HANDELOUP_000_074<tab>It seems the restoration is proceeding apace. Your duty is almost at an end, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I hope it has been a worthwhile journey so far.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_HANDELOUP_000_074<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿、修復も大詰めと聞く。
モーグリたちの支援を、最後までしかとお願いする。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_VAINCANNET_100_074<tab>You require an idol, yes? I believe this one should do─they all look the same to me. Dreadfully ugly, isn't it? Well, I suppose there's no accounting for taste.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_VAINCANNET_100_074<tab>……押収した「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C3C01 /var>」を渡してほしいと？
アンドゥルー卿の許可があるなら、問題はない。
こんな物、何に使うつもりかわからんが、持っていくといい。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_075<tab>We've found the perfect stones, kupo! Have you returned with something we can use? Oh, I can't wait until we begin building!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_075<tab>ちょうどいい石材を見つけてきたくぽ！
でも、別件でちょっと問題発生くぽ……。
ともかくセンセイは、オヤカタと話をしてほしいくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_OHLDEEH_000_076<tab>If you need any more help carrying stones, I'm the dragon for you! I can do that all day!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_OHLDEEH_000_076<tab>てやんでい、俺っちが力を貸せば、石材集めなんざ朝飯前よ！
こんくらいの仕事なら、いつでもやってやるぜぃ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_080<tab>You are returned! Was Handeloup willing to oblige our request?
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_080<tab>戻ったか、冒険者殿。
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C3C01 /var>」は、首尾よく借り受けられたかの？

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_081<tab>This is an object of heresy and untold evil? It seems harmless enough to me, and the craftsmanship is superb! I do believe this will provide the perfect model for our statue. Excellent work, my friend!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_081<tab>……これが「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C3C01 /var>」か。
状態は悪くないし、これなら手本として使えよう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_082<tab>However, I cannot help but notice you no longer have the letter I wrote. I suppose that means Ser Handeloup told you who I am, that a simple epistle would sway a man of his standing.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_082<tab>……ときに、冒険者殿。
アンドゥルー卿に、書状を渡したようじゃの。
ならば、ワシが何者かも、聞いたのであろうな？

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_083<tab>Well then, let me apologize for the belated introduction. I am Tarresson de Dzemael, erstwhile count of my house. I am happy to say my son now enjoys that burden, leaving me to spend my days as I please.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_083<tab>遅れてしもうたが、名乗らせていただく。
ワシの名は、タレソン・ド・ゼーメル。
すでに家督は息子に譲ったが、これでも前伯爵じゃ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_084<tab>I try to stay busy, of course, and our project here has been a boon in that regard. However, do not think this some whim born of idleness. No, this is how I wish to live out my twilight years. As my true self. As a craftsman.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_084<tab>大貴族が修復計画に参加するのは、意外じゃったか？
貴族の道楽だと、お主に思われるかもしれんが……
最後くらいは、ただの職人として生きたくての。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_085<tab>House Dzemael was built upon a foundation of mastery. Mastery of wood, steel, and stone. From a young age I strove to learn the techniques of my forefathers. Alas, once I became count, I was forced to trade my hammer and chisel for quill and parchment.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_085<tab>ゼーメル家は、築城技術に長ける名門じゃ。
ゆえに、ワシは幼き頃より職人たちに親しみ、その技を身につけた。
じゃが、伯爵位を継いでからは、道具を握ることも少なくなった。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_100_085<tab>A count's craft is to uphold the honor of his house, his tools, his wit, and his wiles. I was bound to the eternal struggle for glory and prestige, and as the months bled into years my days as an artisan faded into half-forgotten memory.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_100_085<tab>権謀術数を駆使して、権力闘争に明け暮れる日々……。
すべては名門、ゼーメル家を守るため……。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_086<tab>It was in this single-minded state I raised my sons, teaching them naught of the joy of crafting. Perhaps by imparting my knowledge to others, I am in some small way trying to alleviate that regret...
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_086<tab>そんな姿ばかり見せて、育ててしまったせいかのう。
ワシは息子らに、「職人魂」の何たるかを教えてやれなんだ。
モーグリ族への技術指導は、その贖罪なのやもしれんな。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_087<tab>Hahaha, I have gone on too long again! Truly, I thank you for listening to this old man's ramblings. Now, let us return to the task at hand! The statue must be built, and I have a job perfectly suited to your skills.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_087<tab>……ファッファッファッ、つまらぬ老人の繰り言であったの。
話を石像の修復に戻そうではないか。
もちろん、冒険者殿にも、しっかり働いてもらうぞ？

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_090<tab>Our sculpture will require sturdy metal beams to support the weight of the stone. Although they will remain unseen by most, they are nevertheless among the most vital components.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_090<tab>お主に頼みたいのは、丈夫な金属杭じゃ。
重みのある石像をしっかり支える重要な部材を、
腕利きである冒険者殿に任せたい。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_100<tab>A sculpture must be polished to a mirror sheen if it is to be remembered. And to that end, I would have you make the materials required to do so.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_100<tab>お主に頼みたいのは、石材用の研磨布紙じゃ。
美しい石像を造り上げるには、仕上げの磨きが肝心よ。
腕利きである冒険者殿に、良質な研磨布紙を用意してもらいたい。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_110<tab>What purpose would our efforts serve if the sculpture we build cannot withstand the elements? To prevent that from happening, I would ask that you prepare a coating to shield our work from the harsh winds and rains of this region.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_110<tab>お主に頼みたいのは、石材用の保護剤じゃ。
雲海の強い風から石像を守るには、必要な代物での。
腕利きである冒険者殿に、用意してもらいたい。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_120<tab>As always, Mogmul shall provide you with aught you require. Bring your completed work to Mogzin, and we shall make use of it at once!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_120<tab>必要な素材は「モグムリ」から受け取り、
完成したら「モグジン」へ渡しておくれ。
いつものように頼んだぞ、冒険者殿。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_121<tab>You're helping us with the statue, kupo? Brilliant! Truth be told, a task this large is a bit intimidating. Still, I look forward to the day when the Mogmenders can face such a project without fear!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_121<tab>石像の修復を手伝ってくれるくぽ？
とっても嬉しいけど、複雑くぽ。
早くセンセイの手を借りなくてもいいようにならないと、くぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_122<tab>Well, I believe we all have our work to do. Receive your supplies from Mogmul, and bring your finished work to Mogzin.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_TARRESSON_000_122<tab>「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F23D6B01 /var>」の製作を頼む。
必要な素材は「モグムリ」から受け取るとええ。
完成したら、冒険者殿から「モグジン」へ渡しておくれ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGMUL_000_130<tab>Did you see them moving those huge stones, kupo? Just watching them made my belly rumble. But I will do my duty! Until the statue is complete, I'll be here to give you whatever you need!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGMUL_000_130<tab>みんなで石像を修復中くぽ。
お腹が減ったけど、一段落するまで我慢くぽ！
……冒険者さんも手伝ってくれるなら、素材をご提供くぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGMUL_000_131<tab>The Mogmenders have plenty of supplies to spare, so there's no need to worry about running out. Just say the word and I'll fill your bags with anything you need, kupo!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGMUL_000_131<tab>素材なら、このときのためにみんなで集めたから、
まだまだいっぱいあるくぽ！
冒険者さんも、足りなくなったら言ってほしいくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGMUL_100_131<tab>I've learned to expect only greatness from you, and you've never disappointed, kupo! All who have aided in making this possible, both past and present, are surely glad to have a crafter like you to work their materials.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGMUL_100_131<tab>冒険者さんは、いつでもすごいものをつくるくぽ！
素材を集めた仲間たちも、草葉の陰で喜んでいるくぽ！
……あれ、なんか違うくぽ？

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_140<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, it goes without saying, but the Mogmenders are grateful for all your help so far, kupo! Just a little bit more, and we'll have finished. So, let's see what you've made!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_140<tab>センセイ、「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) F23D6B01 /var>」を製作してくれたくぽ？
お手間を取らせて、申し訳ないくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_131<tab>You've certainly outdone yourself this time! Gullinbursti will surely be in awe at the quality of our work! And now, all that's left is to build, build, build!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_131<tab>センセイが製作する物は、いつ見てもすごいくぽ。
これなら石像自体の品質も、ぜったい高くなるくぽ！
さあ、この部材を使って修復続行くぽーッ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_300<tab>We've done it, kupo! Can you feel it? This must be how the landlords and skylords felt the moment they built this plaza ages ago. I can only imagine what Gullinbursti's reaction will be!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_300<tab>で、できたくぽ……。
完璧な形に仕上がったくぽ。
これならグリンブルスティさんも、認めてくれるはずくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_COLORDRAGON_000_301<tab>Little ones, how fares your work? If it is too difficult, simply say so. I shall allow you to return home before I raze this place to the ground.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_COLORDRAGON_000_301<tab>モーグリたちよ、我が要求した石像の修復はどうだ？
そろそろ諦めて降参する頃合いかと思い、
様子を見にきたのだが……。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_302<tab>On the contrary, Gullinbursti, you could not have arrived at a more opportune time! The statue is complete, and I daresay even more majestic than it was before. Behold!
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_302<tab>これはちょうどいいところに、くぽ！
たった今、石像の修復を終えたところくぽ！
しっかりと見て、モグたちを認めるくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_COLORDRAGON_000_303<tab>I have not seen this statue in a long time. Yes, it is as it was. Almost.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_COLORDRAGON_000_303<tab>「ヒトとドラゴン」の石像……。
千年の昔に「友情の証」として据えられたものと、よく似ておる。
しかし、我は…………。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_COLORDRAGON_000_304<tab>Your work is...adequate. As promised, I shall leave you be. Continue in peace.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_COLORDRAGON_000_304<tab>いや……少し昔を思い出しただけだ。
認めよう、モーグリたちよ。
今後は気兼ねなく、この広場の修復を進めるがいい。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_305<tab>Almost? Adequate? But why would he say that, kupo?
target: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_MOGZIN_000_305<tab>……グリンブルスティさん、妥協した、くぽ？

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SYSTEM_000_500<tab>Thanks to your efforts, the statue has been erected in Bahrr Lehs. It would seem your work is complete, but Gullinbursti's cryptic words suggest otherwise.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SYSTEM_000_500<tab>モグモグ修復団によって石像が修復されました。
しかしモグジンには、
グリンブルスティの様子が気になるようです……。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SYSTEM_000_200<tab>You have achieved <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Honored<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> reputation with the Mogmenders.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SYSTEM_000_200<tab>「モーグリ族：モグモグ修復団」との友好関係が、
「名誉」になりました。
目標である石像の修復を達成し、結束が固まったようです。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SYSTEM_000_201<tab>New moogle tribal daily quests are now available from Mogek the Marvelous at the plaza.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SYSTEM_000_201<tab>これ以降、バール・レス広場にいる「お利口のモグエク」より、
新たな「友好部族デイリークエスト」を受注することができます。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SYSTEM_000_202<tab>Furthermore, you will be able to undertake three additional quests from Mogek the Marvelous as a reputation rank bonus. This bonus is available until the daily reset time for tribal quests.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SYSTEM_000_202<tab>なお、友好ランクが上がった当日に限り、
「お利口のモグエク」から受注できるデイリークエストの数が、
ボーナスとして、3つ追加されています。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SYSTEM_000_203<tab>These additional quests will become available after accepting all current daily quests from Mogek the Marvelous. Please be advised that you cannot undertake these quests if you have no remaining allowances.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SYSTEM_000_203<tab>友好ランクが上がる前に発行されたデイリークエストを、
すべて受注するとボーナス分が発行され、
受注権のある限り、これを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SYSTEM_000_204<tab>You now have access to a wider selection of wares from Mogmul Mogbelly.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG006_02325_SYSTEM_000_204<tab>また、「大食いのモグムリ」より、
「友好関係：名誉」の商品を購入できるようになりました。
今後の冒険に役立てましょう！
